The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including pink, purple, and white, and are often used in ornamental horticulture. Thelepaepale scrobiculata thrives in moist, well-drained soils and requires a humid environment to flourish.
